item.title: Wi-Fi Router Settings
item.description: Wi-Fi Router Settings Dual-band 2.4 GHz has better range but can be more crowded. 5 GHz offers faster speeds but has shorter range. For dual-band routers, consider using 5 GHz for high-bandwidth activities (like gaming or streaming) and 2.4 GHz for general usage. Channel If experiencing slow speeds, try changing the Wi-Fi channel to avoid interference from other networks. Frequency Bandwidth Frequency Bandwidth determines the width of the frequency range the router uses to transmit data over Wi-Fi.
